name: ReziioSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, Lock the door”
”Alexa, set the thermostat to 73 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill you can now interact with the installed smart devices in your apartment by voice or directly from the Alexa app. To make use of voice commands you will need to have an Amazon Alexa voice enabled device linked to your Amazon account.
To get started, ap the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa app to link your Amazon account to the Reziio Smart Home skill.

Once the skill is enabled you can control associated devices by using a voice command. To do this use the voice control wake word , “Alexa”, followed by a command. Examples of this 
• “Alexa” – is Front Door locked ?
• “Alexa” – Lock Front Door
• “Alexa” – What is the Thermostat temperature
• “Alexa” – set Thermostat mode to Heat/Cool/Auto/Off
• “Alexa” – set Thermostat setpoint to 75 degrees

New features and enhancements will be made from time to time to improve your experience.

 Please note that this skill is intended for use in your Reziio Smart Home enabled apartment.
